location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to the Garrison Paymaster, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an audit abstract for batta (not present) for the marine detachment at the Bushire Residency for March 1812. It also encloses a muster roll and abstract of pay and batta (also not present) for the Madras Cavalry Artillery detachment and the public artificers, that are currently en route back to Bombay.
